program: Bachelor of Science in Mathematical Sciences
special requirements / general informati: Bachelor of Science degree in any ONE of the following subjects: Mathematics, Statistics, Biomathematics, Physics. Or Bachelor of Science in any TWO of the following subjects: Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Physics. Note I: Applicants who choose the Mathematical Sciences option cannot pursue a single major in Computer Science, but they may combine Computer Science with any of the other three subjects: Mathematics, Statistics, or Physics. Note II: Applicants who choose the Mathematical Sciences option may ONLY pursue a single or combined major in Physics if they have credit passes in both Physics and Chemistry.
